subtitle: A quick and simple substitute to the real thing.

method.text: Put the water, egg yolks, seasoning and lemon juice into a food processor. Process for approx 10 seconds.
With the motor still running, slowly add the melted butter through the feed tube in a slow but steady steam until the mixture emulsifies, becomes creamy and all is incorporated.
If the hollandaise is too thick for your purpose simply add a little extra water, as before by pouring through the 'feed' tube while the motor is still running. Serve immediately.

title: Cheats hollandaise sauce
